title: Do's and Don'ts
subtitle: If nothing else, follow these 6 guidelines.

fields.name: checklist.admitFault
fields.label: Don’t admit fault, even if you think it is.

fields.name: checklist.discussAccident
fields.label: Turn off your car and stay close to the accident site.

fields.name: checklist.diminishInjury
fields.label: Don’t say that you’re uninjured, it may take time for symptoms to appear.

fields.name: checklist.acceptPayment
fields.label: Don’t accept payment, it’s too risky.

fields.name: checklist.collectInformation
fields.label: Collect information at the accident scene (that’s next).
